value.name: Mexican Troops Nab Reputed Drug Capo
value.description: The department said that Jesus Alejandro Salazar Rodriguez managed the cartel ... were behind the murder of a high-ranking Cancun police officer who refused to cooperate with the cartel.

value.name: Braves Hand Lookouts Third-Straight Loss
value.description: Alejandro Salazar had singled to right leading off for the Braves in the second, but he was erased when Luis Valenzuela bounced into a 4-6-3 double play. Unfortunately, the second hit the lanky ...

value.name: Lookouts Take Series From M-Braves With Sunday's 9-2 Win
value.description: A seven-run fourth inning has propelled the Lookouts to a 9-2 win at AT&T Field on Sunday afternoon. With the victory, Chattanooga has now won each of their last three series against the Braves.
